```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
```

## Slide 1

Veamos un resumen de la BBDD "cars":
```{r}
summary(cars)
```

## Slide 2

Grafiquemos la BBDD "pressure" usando un scatterplot:

```{r, out.width="75%", fig.align="center"}
pressure %>%
  ggplot2::ggplot() +
  ggplot2::geom_point(ggplot2::aes(y = pressure, x = temperature)) +
  ggplot2::theme_classic(base_size = 30)
```

## Slide 3

Veamos las 5 primeras filas de la BBDD "pressure": `r a`
```{r}
knitr::kable(head(pressure))
```
